property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: The title that displays above the line graph.

property.name: fieldsCsv
property.label: Metric Fields (CSV)
property.description: Comma-separated list of target object field's API names that will be used as dots on the graph.

property.name: childObjectApiName
property.label: Child Object API Name
property.description: The API name of the target object that will be used to generate dots on the graph.

property.name: dateFieldApiName
property.label: Date/Datetime Field API Name
property.description: The API name of the date field used to create the X-axis on the graph. Can be date or datetime.

property.name: parentLookupPath
property.label: Parent Lookup Path (supports dot notation)
property.description: Parent lookup field from the target record to the current recordId, supports dot notation with __c (not __r). Example: Student__c, Student__c.AccountId, Student__c.Account.OwnerId

property.name: dateFilter
property.label: Relative Date Filter (optional)
property.description: Filter the date range of records to display. Compatible with Salesforce literals like THIS_YEAR, LAST_MONTH, NEXT_QUARTER, LAST_N_DAYS:30, etc. Only enter 1. Optional.
